1456420.name: Manikineko Online
1456420.description:
Welcome to Manikineko Online, a groundbreaking MMORPG/Virtual World that merges fantasy, anime, cartoons, and every fictional universe into a single, vibrant tapestry.

Intro to The Lore

In a future where technology and magic intertwine, a portal to the afterlife was opened, heralding the arrival of the Phoenix God. This deity, embodying compassion and love, took on her final form - a fiery phoenix. After decades of peace, she decided to bestow her divine powers upon a chosen few - the players, who are the descendants of this majestic god.

Your Journey Begins

Spawned into this fantasy realm, you'll explore an endless universe where every fictional character you've ever known exists. Here, you'll:

- Awaken Your Powers: As a descendant of the Phoenix God, harness your unique abilities to shape the world these are known as skills.

- Meet Sky: The enigmatic ruler of this realm, Sky, controls the Dreamscape, a mystical bridge connecting fantastical beings to the real world. Once used by angels and the spirits of the deceased, now it serves as a conduit for a new era of interaction between realms.

- Interact with Legends: Encounter and ally with characters from every conceivable fictional narrative - from ancient myths to modern manga.

Gameplay Features

- Infinite Exploration(Not implemented yet): Traverse through landscapes that defy reality, from anime-style cities to cartoonish wonderlands.

- Customization: Tailor your avatar with powers, outfits, and accessories inspired by a mix of genres.

  • Custom Character Models: All our classes have a fully custom made anime-styled character

  • Modding Support(W.I.P): Create and manage custom regions ran by community members, expanding the world with unique content.

  •  Crafting: Gather resources and craft items, armor, and weapons to aid you in your adventures.

  • Monsters: Face a variety of creatures and foes from across all genres, each with unique challenges and rewards.

  • Different Classes: Choose from a diverse set of classes, each with distinct abilities and playstyles.

- Art Style Fusion(W.I.P): Experience a blend of anime aesthetics, realism, and medieval MMO-style visuals for a unique look.

- Classical MMORPG Combat System: Engage in combat with a WoW-like system where skills and strategy are key to victory.

- Networking: Powered by Unity Mirror and UMMORPG for seamless multiplayer interactions.

The Dreamscape lore

With the portal's opening, the purpose of the Dreamscape evolved. No longer just a pathway for the deceased but a vibrant space where the boundaries between reality and fiction blur, allowing for unparalleled interactions and adventures.

Join the Legacy

Step into this magical universe where you can be part of something truly extraordinary. Become a guardian of the realms, a hero or villain in stories yet to be written, and explore the infinite possibilities where your imagination is your only limit.
